Description: Pottery vase of coarse straw tempered Nile silt, body tapering to a point, roll rim, exterior coated with red wash or self-slip.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna (London, 1911), p. 21; pl. xxxiv.76b, reproduced as Rough ware R76B in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery. Marked H21 on side.
